task.name: r.volume
task.description: Calculates the volume of data "clumps", and (optionally) produces a GRASS vector points map containing the calculated centroids of these clumps.

parameter.name: data
parameter.description: Existing raster map representing data that will be summed within clumps

parameter.name: clump
parameter.description: Mapa ráster existente, preferiblemente la salida de r.clump

parameter.name: centroids
parameter.description: Vector points map to contain clump centroids

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Permite a los archivos de salida sobrescribir los archivos existentes.
